mapper.select: /*allTodoList*/ SELECT categoryName , todoNo , todoTitle , todoContent , DATE_FORMAT(todoDay, '%Y-%m-%d') AS todoDay , DATE_FORMAT(todoTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS todoTime , stateKor FROM category AS c , testtododetail AS t , grbstate AS g WHERE c.categoryId = t.categoryId AND t.todoState = g.stateCode GROUP BY todoNo ORDER BY todoDay ASC , todoTime IS NULL ASC , todoTime ASC

/*getCategoryTodoList*/ SELECT categoryName , todoNo , todoTitle , todoContent , DATE_FORMAT(todoDay, '%Y-%m-%d') AS todoDay , DATE_FORMAT(todoTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS todoTime , stateKor FROM category AS c , testtododetail AS t , grbstate AS g WHERE c.categoryId = t.categoryId AND t.todoState = g.stateCode AND HEX(t.categoryId) = #{categoryId} GROUP BY todoNo ORDER BY todoDay ASC , todoTime IS NULL ASC , todoTime ASC

/*getTodoDetail*/ SELECT HEX(t.categoryId) AS categoryId , categoryName , todoNo , todoTitle , todoContent , DATE_FORMAT(todoDay, '%Y-%m-%d') AS todoDay , DATE_FORMAT(todoTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS todoTime , stateKor FROM category AS c , testtododetail AS t , grbstate AS g WHERE c.categoryId = t.categoryId AND t.todoState = g.stateCode AND HEX(t.categoryId) = #{categoryId} AND todoNo = #{todoNo}
